item.title: Where to put a code. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

its ok, i followed wot pure sed

what source?----edit---- in client.java search for

Code:
if(((itemUsed == 165) && (otherItem == 165))){
deleteItem(165, getItemSlot(165), 1);
deleteItem(165, getItemSlot(165), 1);
addItem(2442, 1);
addItem(229, 1);
sM(“You have combined the liquid into 4 doses.”);
under that before next potion add a } then add the code

that worked

Read full topic
item.source: Where to put a code. Help Please!

item.title: Where to put a code. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

wwe4eva:

so i need to decompile my client.class for my client or server?

The reason you compile is for the code within the client class to change into bytecode, which forms your client.class.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to put a code. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

Well… im adding visage (chocolate bomb, looks like visage) + anti drag shield = dragon fire shield.

Here is my code.

            if(itemUsed == 2185 && useWith == 1540) {
               deleteItem(2185, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
               deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
               addItem(2621, 1);
               sendMessage("Gratz! You Made A Dragonfire Shield!");
            }
